column1: Great dupe for SK-II! You're skin will look hydrated and this helps other products in your skin care routine help them do their thing!
Love this Time revolution the first treatment intensive. I personally think it is as good as the SKII essence, feels great, and texture is amazing at a great value
Love this treatment from Missha. really moisturizing and great value. came in 2-day shipping

Love this Missha Time Revolution Essence. It cleans up and preps your skin really well after cleansing and moisturizes the skin really well. One of my favorite moisturizing essence, on my 3rd bottle now :)
